title: Includes land used for processing or retail merchandising of agricultural products within the real property tax exemption for land used in agricultural production
summary: Includes land used for processing or retail merchandising of agricultural products within the real property tax exemption for land used in agricultural production.

       Introduced  by Sens. YOUNG, RANZENHOFER -- read twice and ordered print-

       AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and  the  real  property
         tax  law, in relation to property tax exemption for on-farm structures
         that provide added value to farm products

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  opening paragraph of subdivision 4 of section 301 of
    2  the agriculture and markets law, as separately amended by  chapters  445
    3  and 696 of the laws of 2002, is amended to read as follows:
    4    "Land used in agricultural production" means not less than seven acres
    5  of  land  used  as a single operation in the preceding two years for the
    6  production for sale of crops, livestock  or  livestock  products  of  an
    7  average  gross sales value of ten thousand dollars or more; or, not less
    8  than seven acres of land used in the preceding two years  to  support  a
    9  commercial  horse  boarding  operation with annual gross receipts of ten
   10  thousand dollars or more. Land used  in  agricultural  production  shall
   11  [not]  include  land  or  portions thereof used for processing or retail
   12  merchandising of such crops, livestock or livestock products. Land  used
   13  in agricultural production shall also include:
   14    S  2.  Subdivision  2  of section 483 of the real property tax law, as
   15  amended by chapter 540 of the laws  of  2007,  is  amended  to  read  as
   16  follows:
   17    2.  The  term "structures and buildings" shall include: (a) structures
   18  and buildings or portions thereof used directly and exclusively  in  the
   19  raising  and  production  for  sale  of  agricultural  and horticultural
   20  commodities or necessary for the storage thereof, [but not] AND  INCLUD-
   21  ING structures and buildings or portions thereof used for the processing
   22  of agricultural and horticultural commodities, or the retail merchandis-
   23  ing  of  such  commodities; (b) structures and buildings used to provide

    2  who are primarily employed in connection with  the  operation  of  lands
    3  actively  devoted to agricultural and horticultural use, but not includ-
    4  ing  structures  and  buildings occupied as a residence by the applicant
    5  and his immediate family; (c) structures and buildings  used  as  indoor
    6  exercise  arenas  exclusively  for  training  and  exercising  horses in
    7  connection with the raising and production for sale of agricultural  and
    8  horticultural  commodities  or  in  connection  with  a commercial horse
    9  boarding operation as defined in section three hundred one of the  agri-
   10  culture  and markets law. For purposes of this section, the term "indoor
   11  exercise arenas" shall not include riding academies or dude ranches; (d)
   12  structures and buildings used in the  production  of  maple  syrup;  (e)
   13  structures  and  buildings  used  in the production of honey and beeswax
   14  including those structures and buildings used for the storage  of  bees.
   15  For purposes of this section, this shall not include those structures or
   16  buildings  and portions thereof used for the sale of maple syrup or sale
   17  of honey and beeswax. The term  "structures  and  buildings"  shall  not
   18  include  silos, bulk milk tanks or coolers, or manure storage and handl-
   19  ing facilities as such terms are used in section  four  hundred  eighty-
   20  three-a of this title.
   21    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately and shall apply to assess-
   22  ment rolls prepared on the basis of taxable status dates occurring on or
   23  after such date.
